definition: A vessel that transports people, vehicles, or goods across a body of water, typically between two fixed points. It is commonly used for short-distance transportation, often connecting two shores or islands.

examples.german: Wir nehmen die Fähre, um die Insel zu erreichen.
examples.english: We take the ferry to reach the island.

examples.german: Die Fähre legt am Hafen an.
examples.english: The ferry docks at the harbor.

examples.german: Die Fähre bietet eine schöne Aussicht auf das Meer.
examples.english: The ferry offers a beautiful view of the sea.
